name: SpaceCube (SciDev)
description:
You are a square and you are stuck in space. You have to collect resources from asteroids to make an SOS probe to get home.
PS. if you don't have enough items to place a part it will not place.
Good luck.

CONTROLS: WASD/ARROW KEYS: move E: interact I: inventory Click on part or asteroid: break Click on part icon in right menu: place
